channel.title: RWpod - подкаст про мир Ruby и Web технологии
channel.description: RWpod - подкаст про мир Ruby и Web технологии (для тех, кому нравится мыслить в Ruby стиле).
channel.itunes:author: RWpod команда
channel.itunes:keywords: RWpod, Ruby, Web, подкаст, русский подкаст, скринкасты, программирование
channel.media:keywords: RWpod, Ruby, Web, подкаст, русский подкаст, скринкасты, программирование

item.title: 01 выпуск 03 сезона. Релиз Ruby 2.2.0, rubybench.org, Ginatra, Titon, Sheetsee.js, JSbooks и прочее
item.description:
Добрый день уважаемые слушатели. Представляем новый выпуск подкаста RWpod. В этом выпуске:

Ruby

  • Релиз Ruby 2.2.0, Ruby 2.2.0 Time#parse TZ-related regression и Announcing rubybench.org
  • Speed Up Rails By Starting on the Front и Five Ruby Methods You Should Be Using
  • Fast Feature Vector Distance Sorting Using Postgres и ActiveRecord 4.2’s Type Casting
  • Ginatra - a web frontend for Git repositories и Loaf - manages and displays breadcrumb trails in Rails app

JavaScript

  • Style Guide Best Practices и Titon - a collection of extensible front-end user interface components for the responsive and mobile web
  • EmberScript - Ember.js-Infused CoffeeScript и React Templates
  • Sheetsee.js is a library for connecting Google Spreadsheets to a website and visualizing the information, Particles.js и Select3
  • JSbooks - free JavaScript books и Adaptive Web Design

item.title: 43 выпуск 02 сезона. Релизы Rails 4.2, PostgreSQL 9.4, jQuery 1.11.2 и 2.1.3, Evil Icons, Converse.js и прочее
item.description:
Добрый день уважаемые слушатели. Представляем новый выпуск подкаста RWpod. В этом выпуске:

Ruby

  • Релизы Rails 4.2 и PostgreSQL 9.4. Vulnerability announced: update your Git clients
  • Hashie Considered Harmful и Benchmarking Ruby with GCC (4.4, 4.7, 4.8, 4.9) and Clang (3.2, 3.3, 3.4, 3.5)
  • A Ruby refactor: exploring dependency injection options и The 7 Best Free Ruby Tutorials for Beginners

JavaScript

  • Релиз jQuery 1.11.2 и 2.1.3 и Libscore
  • The 5 Most Popular Frontend Frameworks of 2014 Compared и Converse.js - a free and open-source XMPP chat client for your website
  • Evil Icons и SVG Loaders

Обсуждаем

  • Web Design Trends To Look Out For In 2015
  • JavaScript Application Architecture On The Road To 2015
  • Web Development Trends For 2015 And Beyond
  • The Languages And Frameworks That You Should Learn In 2015
  • Best web technologies and tools for 2015

item.title: 41 выпуск 02 сезона. Rails 4.2.0.rc2, Ruby 2.2.0-preview2, Ruby Object Mapper, Duktape, RoadTrafficSimulator и прочее
item.description:
Добрый день уважаемые слушатели. Представляем новый выпуск подкаста RWpod. В этом выпуске:

Ruby

  • Релиз Rails 4.2.0.rc2, Ruby 2.2.0-preview2 и Ruby Object Mapper
  • Doing an API Mashup with Sinatra и A Guide to Caching Your Rails Application With Fastly
  • Testing and Environment Variables и Have Some (Referential) Integrity with Foreign Keys
  • Ruby-prof-flamegraph и Ruby Meditation 5

JavaScript

  • Why io.js decided to fork Node.js и Regulex - JavaScript Regular Expression Visualizer
  • Flexbox as a solution for browser reflow optimization, Siesta - Object Mapping for Javascript и ObjectDB – an easier way to use indexedDB
  • Duktape is an embeddable Javascript engine, MetricsGraphics.js и PhysicsJS
  • RoadTrafficSimulator, PhotoSwipe - JavaScript gallery и Tappy - is a JavaScript library for recording and comparing rhythms
  • Can I Use для веб типографии, Material Design Preloader и CSS Stats

item.title: 40 выпуск 02 сезона. Rails 4.2.0.rc1, Flip Flop Operator in Ruby, Ferry, Front-end Tooling Workflows, 2 years with Angular и прочее
item.description:
Добрый день уважаемые слушатели. Представляем новый выпуск подкаста RWpod. В этом выпуске:

Ruby

  • Релиз Rails 4.2.0.rc1 и Flip Flop Operator in Ruby
  • Building a Binary Tree with Enumerable и String Interpolation: The Bad Parts
  • How I sped up our Rails Test Suite by 267% и Speed Up JavaScript Capybara Specs by Blacklisting URLs
  • Ferry - command-line tool rubygem designed for data migrations and manipulation, Treat - natural language processing framework for Ruby и React + Backbone + Middleman (screencast)

JavaScript

  • Front-end Tooling Workflows и A Guide to Optimising Website & Application Performance
  • 2 years with Angular. Verdict: good enough (not really) и The Hobbit Experience 2014
  • Lining.js — библиотека, дающая возможность управлять строками, Face Detection — jQuery/Zepto плагин для определения лиц в изображениях и видео и QuaggaJS is an advanced barcode-reader written in JavaScript
  • Atomus - running client-side tests in Node.js environment, Delorean - completely agnostic JavaScript framework to apply Flux concepts и Clappr - an extensible media player for the web

  • ENVied, or how I stopped worrying about Ruby’s ENV и Zopfli-ffi - Ruby wrapper for zopfli library

JavaScript

  • How Google broke the OSS compact with Angular 2.0 и Meteor 1.0
  • Statically typed JavaScript via Microsoft TypeScript, Facebook Flow and Google AtScript и Why we should stop using Grunt and Gulp
  • React 0.12 и React (and why it’s awesome)
  • Walkway.js - an easy way to animate SVG images consisting of line and path elements и Immutable.js
  • Tim Taubert: Keeping secrets with JavaScript (video)

  • Learn You Some Erlang for great good! (book, free)

  • V8 engine (C wrapper) with pool

item.title: 33 выпуск 02 сезона. 20000 Leagues Under ActiveRecord, Automatic eager loading in rails, Toshi, NPM 2.0.0, Waves.js, Kefir.js и прочее
item.description:
Добрый день уважаемые слушатели. Представляем новый выпуск подкаста RWpod. В этом выпуске:

Ruby

  • 20,000 Leagues Under ActiveRecord и How Arel Converts Ruby Queries Into SQL Statements
  • Automatic eager loading in rails и ActiveRecord Eager Loading with Query Objects and Decorators
  • How Do Gems Work? и Getting Started With Active Job
  • Postgres full-text search is Good Enough! и Rebuilding Capistrano like deployment with Ansible
  • Validating JSON Schemas with an RSpec Matcher
  • Toshi, Byebug и Airborne

JavaScript

item.title: 21 выпуск 02 сезона. Teatro.io, pg_query, Gemoji, Marionettejs, Mean.io, Hamlet и прочее
item.description:

  • Introducing pg_query: Parse PostgreSQL queries in Ruby
  • Preserving Model History with ActiveRecord and PostgreSQL

  • 12 Videos from JSConf 2014
  • Релиз Marionettejs 2.0.1
  • Ng-newsletter
